  • Constructor Details

    • AssessmentContentItemBuilder

      public AssessmentContentItemBuilder()
      Creates a new AssessmentContentItemBuilder

  • Method Details

    • uiReadyContentItem

      public static AssessmentContentItemBuilder uiReadyContentItem()
      Creates a new, ui ready, AssessmentContentItemBuilder with the following fields set
      • Claim - if a claim is specified via onClaim or by using claimBuilder.withOfficial then use the specified claim. Otherwise a new ui ready auto claim is created.
      • Name - set to unique title of the form NameN
      • ReportNumber - set to unique report number of the form RN (R0, R1...)
      • OfficialType - set to a random type
        Returns:
        a new ui ready builder

      • withAction

        public AssessmentContentItemBuilder withAction(AssessmentContentAction action)
        Sets the assessmentContentAction
        Parameters:
        action - the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withUniqueAction

        public AssessmentContentItemBuilder withUniqueAction()
        Sets the assessmentContentAction to a random value (just cycles through the content action category typelist)
        Returns:
        the modified builder
